name: In the mind of M T-Pain
body:
## Welcome
Hello, world. Welcome to my github.io page. It will be awesome, soon, I promise.

### Interests
At work, we use [D](www.dlang.org) for all our data processing.  Throughout grad school and undergrad, most of my projects used [python](www.python.org). Recently, I've been using python for prototyping new stuff, especially graphs with [NetworkX](http://networkx.github.io/). Visualization has always been a passion for me, so I've been exploring [d3](http://d3js.org/). 

My favorite magazine is [The Economist](http://www.economist.com/), but I'm more of a hippie/radical/free thinker than some expect on first glance.  One project I'll soon include here is my efforts at understanding the military-industrial-academic complex and the vast network of government contracts in general.  

My girl and I have a beautiful garden. It's a beautiful, heartwarming thing to cook up a meal full of stuff we grew ourselves.

When I grow up I want to be a full-stack engineer at a stellar news organization like [Democracy Now!](democracynow.org). 

### About Me
I was born in Rochester, NY, spent four years getting a master's in applied physics at Rice University in Houston.  Currently I'm a data engineer living in Moscow, ID.  I have three cats, Muffin, Lupe, and Giorno.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
